item.title: George Bernard Shaw
item.description: Playwright Born in Dublin Grew up in poverty Dad was alcoholic

item.title: Pygmalion
item.description: Pygmalion Play Written by [[George Bernard Shaw]] in 1912 ![[Victorian Era]] Title is based on Greek mythology Pygamlion - a sculptor; makes an ivory statue representing ideal womanhood; falls in love w his own creation, names her Galatea; prays and gets the statue brought to life

item.title: WB Yeats
item.description: Irish poet Symbolist Inspired by Pre-Raphaelites and William Blake poetry was a reaction to the naturalistic and realistic poetry of the Victorian age Won the Nobel dreams, imagination, visions, magic, and mysticism [[Sailing to Byzantium]]
